attributes.action: Claimants to pay for appeal hearings for non appearance
attributes.additional_details: Claimants should be made to pay when they do not make an appearance at an appeals benefit tribunal. It costs thousands of pounds to organise a benefit tribunal , such as that for ESA. A judge and medical specialist have to be paid and also a presenting officer for the DWP. After all, it is the claimants whom have asked for the appeal. If they do not turn up - make them contribute towards the cost.
